keyFacts: The document details financial transactions involving multiple beneficiaries and financial institutions.
James S Coven, Gerald Hyasui, Carol Butick, Stanley Goldstein, and Peter B Sobol are named as beneficiaries in the transactions.
The transactions include checks and ACH reports dated September 6, 2019.
Various financial institutions such as Deutsche Bank and Bank of America are mentioned in relation to these transactions.
The document is marked as confidential and pertains to financial records related to the Epstein case.
